title: HOMFA Bamboo Laptop Desk Adjustable Portable Breakfast Serving Bed Tray with Tilting Top Drawer Retro Color
feature: ✿HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: This bamboo monitor stand riser finished by Natural Eco-friendly and sturdy bamboo board, more sturdy than plastic stand and bamboo material makes your stand looks very fantastic.

✿MULTIFUNCTIONAL DESK: You can use it in many places and many ways. Used for surfing the Internet with your computer, use it for eating food, drawing, reading, doing homework on the bed, sofa, floor, car, etc. Very useful and convenient to move into any room in the house.

✿ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT: Our laptop table has adjustable legs' length and 5 slots tray tilting angles to give you a better viewing experience, besides, a stopper prevents your laptop from slipping from the desktop, very safe to use.

✿CONVENIENT TO USE: With a storage drawer, perfect for storing pen, phone or some small items, besides, the flat desktop is wonderful to reading book or playing computer, it will also be a great gift for family and friends.
✿PORTABLE LAPTOP TABLE SIZE: 21.5''L x 13.6''W x 13''H (54.5 x 34.5 x 23/28/33cm).
description: ★This Homfa bamboo laptop desk is well designed, durable, beautiful, and very adjustable. You can use it as a laptop table, reading desk or working desk or other usage. Unlike the tables used before, this portable lap desk with the newly design, is more convenient for you to use in bed, or on the floor, sofa, car and many other circumstances. ✔100% new and high quality, Eco-friendly and sturdy bamboo material, durable and solid. ✔Newly useful modern design and save space, you can use the table in many occasions. ✔The perfect little slots design make your desk very adjustable, the height of the table can be adjusted according to your requirements. ✔Multipurpose, according to your needs, can be used as a laptop table, breakfast tray, writing desk, reading desk, coloring table, working desk, etc. Also wonderful to place your computer and common items and other desk office stuff. - Material: Bamboo - Color: Retro color - Active table height adjustable: 52/51/50/49cm - Drawer size: 5.9 * 5.5 * 0.8inch(15 * 14 * 2cm) - Active Desktop Size: 13.6 * 13.6 * 0.6inch(34.5 * 34.5 * 1.5cm) - Laptop desk size: 21.5''L x 13.6''W x 13''H (54.5 x 34.5 x 23/28/33cm).(Height adjustable) 1 * Bamboo Laptop Desk
